remarks: Convert a univariate polynomial function to multivariate. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pf1rcl.q $e |- Q = ran ( eval1 ` R ) $.
pf1f.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mpfpf1.q $e |- E = ran ( 1o eval R ) $.
pf1mpf $p |- ( F e. Q -> ( F o. ( x e. ( B ^m 1o ) |-> ( x ` (/) ) ) ) e. E ) $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d Q x $.
$d R x $.
